Accesses.description: Dictionary of access models; one model per unique remote (s)FTP server.

Host.description: Host name or IP of the remote (s)FTP server.

UserName.description: User name used for log in into the remote server.

UserPassword.description: User password used for log in; less-secured authentication.

KeyName.description: Name of the private key in the Azure Key Vault.

KeyBase64.description: Full private key encoded in base64.

InRules.description: Dictionary of download/import rules; the key should be same as 'Kind' property of a schedule.

SourceFilters.description: Array of source file filters; can contain * or _ wildcard characters.

DestinationFolder.description: Folder or path where the content will be placed in the import container.

IsOverwriteAllowed.description: Enables or disables the overriding of content on the import container.

OutRules.description: Dictionary of upload/export rules; key should be same as the root folder of the export container.

DestinationFolder.description: Destination folder as prefix for target path of the content of the remote server.

IsOverwriteAllowed.description: Enables or disables the overriding of content on the remote server.
